thread.title: Playboy to become PG-13... cats and dogs living together...
thread.title_full: Playboy to become PG-13... cats and dogs living together...

title: Playboy to become PG-13... cats and dogs living together...
text: [news] 12:05 I think they're going more for the GQ angle rather than FHM, they've always been a 'lifestyle magazine' more than an out and out grumble mag. My Barber still has them in the shop, but he cuts out all the nude pictures (I wonder what his wife thinks when she gets home and finds a pile of porn cut outs on the coffee table) it still looks about 80% of the size they are un-censored. Personally I think it'll slow the rot for a few years rather than save the ship, if you weren't starting from where they are now, I don't think anyone would be investing a pile of money into new magazines,. I think their best years financially recently were when oddly they did very well in the ladies fashion.
